mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item( item_num, dcate_num, item_name, item_photo, item_detail, item_price, item_stock, item_status) VALUES( item_seq.nextval, #{dcate_num}, #{item_name}, #{item_photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item_price}, #{item_stock}, #{item_status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
